                  # Evaluates all conditions and returns whether they are all satisfied
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # @param context [Hash] The evaluation context containing sensors and state data
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  # @return [Boolean] True if all conditions are met, false otherwise
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  def conditions_met?(context)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    return false unless enabled
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    # All conditions must be met for the rule to trigger
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    conditions.all? { |condition| evaluate_condition(condition, context) }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  # Executes all actions defined in the rule
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  # @param context [Hash] The execution context containing available actuators
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  # @return [Array<Hash>] Results of each action execution
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  def execute_actions(context)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    return [] unless enabled
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    actions.map { |action| execute_action(action, context) }
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  # Evaluates a single condition
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  # @param condition [Hash] The condition to evaluate
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  # @param context [Hash] The evaluation context
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  # @return [Boolean] Whether the condition is met
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  def evaluate_condition(condition, context)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    entity_id = condition[:entity_id]
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    attribute = condition[:attribute]
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    operator = condition[:operator]
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    value = condition[:value]
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    return false unless context[:entities]&.key?(entity_id)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    entity = context[:entities][entity_id]
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    current_value = entity[attribute]
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    compare_values(current_value, operator, value)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  # Executes a single action
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  # @param action [Hash] The action to execute
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  # @param context [Hash] The execution context
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  # @return [Hash] The result of the action execution
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  def execute_action(action, context)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    actuator_id = action[:actuator_id]
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    command = action[:command].to_sym
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    params = action[:params] || {}
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    return { success: false, error: "Actuator not found: #{actuator_id}" } unless context[:actuators]&.key?(actuator_id)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    actuator = context[:actuators][actuator_id]
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    unless actuator.supports_action?(command)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      return { success: false, error: "Unsupported action: #{command}" }
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      result = actuator.execute(params.merge(command: command))
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      {
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                        success: result[:success],
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                        actuator_id: actuator_id,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                        command: command,
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                        result: result
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      }
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    rescue => e
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      {
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                        success: false,
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                        actuator_id: actuator_id,
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                        command: command,
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                        error: e.message
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      }
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  # Toggles the enabled state of the rule
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  # @return [Boolean] The new enabled state
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  def toggle_enabled
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    @enabled = !@enabled
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    @updated_at = Time.now
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    @enabled
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  private
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  # Compares two values using the specified operator
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  # @param current_value [Object] The current value
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  # @param operator [String] The comparison operator
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  # @param target_value [Object] The target value to compare against
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  # @return [Boolean] The result of the comparison
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  def compare_values(current_value, operator, target_value)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    case operator
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    when "eq", "=="
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                      current_value == target_value
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    when "neq", "!="
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                      current_value != target_value
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    when "gt", ">"
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                      current_value.to_f > target_value.to_f
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    when "gte", ">="
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                      current_value.to_f >= target_value.to_f
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    when "lt", "<"
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                      current_value.to_f < target_value.to_f
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    when "lte", "<="
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                      current_value.to_f <= target_value.to_f
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    when "contains"
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                      current_value.to_s.include?(target_value.to_s)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    when "not_contains"
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                      !current_value.to_s.include?(target_value.to_s)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    when "starts_with"
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                      current_value.to_s.start_with?(target_value.to_s)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    when "ends_with"
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                      current_value.to_s.end_with?(target_value.to_s)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    when "between"
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                      range = target_value.first.to_f..target_value.last.to_f
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                      range.include?(current_value.to_f)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    when "in"
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                      Array(target_value).include?(current_value)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    when "not_in"
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                      !Array(target_value).include?(current_value)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    when "present"
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                      !current_value.nil? && current_value != ""
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    when "blank"
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                      current_value.nil? || current_value == ""
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    else
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                      false
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  def validate!
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "ID cannot be empty" if id.nil? || id.empty?
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "Name cannot be empty" if name.nil? || name.empty?
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "Conditions must be an array" unless conditions.is_a?(Array)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "Actions must be an array" unless actions.is_a?(Array)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "At least one condition is required" if conditions.empty?
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "At least one action is required" if actions.empty?
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    # Validate each condition has required fields
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                    conditions.each do |condition|
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                      unless condition.is_a?(Hash) && condition[:entity_id] && condition[:attribute] && condition[:operator]
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                        raise ArgumentError, "Each condition must have entity_id, attribute, and operator"
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                      end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                    end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    # Validate each action has required fields
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    actions.each do |action|
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                      unless action.is_a?(Hash) && action[:actuator_id] && action[:command]
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                        raise ArgumentError, "Each action must have actuator_id and command"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                      end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                    end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

              end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

            end
          
      182.

    app/core/domain/event.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    56 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 56 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            require "securerandom"
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            module Core
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              module Domain
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # Event represents a domain event in the system
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                class Event
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  attr_reader :id, :name, :source, :data, :timestamp
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  # Create a new Event
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  #
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  # @param id [String, nil] Optional ID for the event (will be auto-generated if not provided)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  # @param name [String] The name/type of the event
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  # @param source [String] The source system that generated the event

                  # @param timestamp [Time] When the event occurred
          
      16.

                  def initialize(name:, source:, data:, id: nil, timestamp: Time.current)

    17.

              module Domain

                class ReflexiveAgent
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  attr_reader :name, :sensors, :actuators, :rules
          
      5.

      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  # Initialize the reflexive agent with name, sensors, actuators and condition-action rules
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  def initialize(name:, sensors: [], actuators: [], rules: {})
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                    @name = name
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    @sensors = sensors
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    @actuators = actuators
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    @rules = {}
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    # Initialize rules if provided
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    if rules.is_a?(Hash)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                      # Handle rules in hash format (condition => action)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                      rules.each do |condition, action|
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                        add_rule_internal(condition, action)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    elsif rules.is_a?(Array)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                      # Handle rules in array format from agent.rb
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      rules.each do |rule|
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                        if rule.is_a?(Hash) && rule[:condition] && rule[:action] && rule[:actuator_name]
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                          # Convert old format to new format
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                          condition = rule[:condition]
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                          action = {
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                            actuator_name: rule[:actuator_name],
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                            action_name: rule[:action]
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                          }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                          add_rule_internal(condition, action)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                        end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    validate!
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  # Main perception-action cycle of the reflexive agent
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  def perceive_and_act
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    # 1. Gather percepts from all sensors
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    percepts = gather_percepts
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    # 2. Process percepts according to condition-action rules
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    actions = determine_actions(percepts)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    # 3. Execute determined actions
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    results = execute_actions(actions, percepts)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    # Return the results of perception and action
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    {
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                      percepts: percepts,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      actions: actions,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                      results: results
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    }
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  # Alias for backward compatibility
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  def run_cycle
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    result = perceive_and_act
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    # For backward compatibility with agent.rb, transform the results format
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    if result[:results]
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      result[:results].map do |r|
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                        if r[:status] == 'success'
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                          condition = @rules.keys.find { |k| @rules[k] == result[:actions].find { |a| a[:action_name] == r[:action] || a[:action] == r[:action] } }
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                          legacy_rule = {
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                            condition: condition,
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                            action: r[:action],
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                            actuator_name: r[:actuator]
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                          }
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                          {
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                            rule: legacy_rule,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                            actuator: r[:actuator],
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                            action: r[:action],
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                            success: true # Explicitly set to true for legacy compatibility
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                          }
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                        else
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                          nil
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                        end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                      end.compact
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    else
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                      []
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  # Method to handle both forms of add_rule
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  def add_rule(*args, **kwargs)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    if args.length >= 1 && kwargs.empty?
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                      # Modern format: add_rule(condition, action)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                      condition, action = args
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                      add_rule_internal(condition, action)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    elsif args.empty? && !kwargs.empty?
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      # Legacy format: add_rule(condition: proc, action: :action, actuator_name: "name")
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      condition = kwargs[:condition]
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                      action = kwargs[:action]
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                      actuator_name = kwargs[:actuator_name]
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      if condition && (action || actuator_name)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                        actual_action = {
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                          actuator_name: actuator_name,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                          action_name: action
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                        }
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                        result = add_rule_internal(condition, actual_action)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                        # Return format expected by agent.rb
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                        {
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                          condition: condition,
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                          action: action,
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                          actuator_name: actuator_name
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                        }
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                      else
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                        raise ArgumentError, "Invalid rule specification. Must provide condition and action"
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                      end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    else
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                      raise ArgumentError, "Invalid arguments to add_rule. Use either add_rule(condition, action) or add_rule(condition: proc, action: :action, actuator_name: 'name')"
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  # Add a new sensor to the agent
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  def add_sensor(sensor)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    validate_sensor(sensor)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    @sensors << sensor
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  # Add a new actuator to the agent
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  def add_actuator(actuator)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    validate_actuator(actuator)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                    @actuators << actuator
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  # Gather percepts from all sensors
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  def perceive
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    gather_percepts
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  private
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  # Internal method to add rules consistently
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  def add_rule_internal(condition, action)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                    validate_rule(condition, action)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    @rules[condition] = action
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    action
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  # Validate required components of the agent
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  def validate!
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "Name cannot be empty" if name.nil? || name.empty?
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "Sensors must be an array" unless sensors.is_a?(Array)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "Actuators must be an array" unless actuators.is_a?(Array)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    # Validate each sensor and actuator
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    sensors.each { |sensor| validate_sensor(sensor) }
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                    actuators.each { |actuator| validate_actuator(actuator) }
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  # Validate that a sensor responds to the perceive method
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  def validate_sensor(sensor)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    unless sensor.respond_to?(:perceive) && sensor.respond_to?(:name)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      raise ArgumentError, "Sensor must implement 'perceive' method and have a 'name' attribute"
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  # Validate that an actuator responds to the execute method
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  def validate_actuator(actuator)
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                    # Support both direct type check and duck typing for flexibility
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                    if defined?(Core::Domain::Actuator) && actuator.is_a?(Core::Domain::Actuator) ||
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                       (actuator.respond_to?(:execute) && actuator.respond_to?(:name) &&
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                        actuator.respond_to?(:supported_actions) && actuator.respond_to?(:supports_action?))
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                      return true
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    else
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                      raise ArgumentError, "Actuator must implement proper interfaces or be a Core::Domain::Actuator"
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  # Validate that a rule's condition is callable and action is valid
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  def validate_rule(condition, action)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                    unless condition.respond_to?(:call)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                      raise ArgumentError, "Rule condition must be callable (respond to 'call' method)"
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                    end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                    if action.is_a?(Hash)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                      # Validate structured action like in agent.rb
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                      unless action[:actuator_name] && (action[:action_name] || action[:action])
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                        raise ArgumentError, "Structured action must include :actuator_name and :action_name (or :action) keys"
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                      end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                      # Normalize the action_name key
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                      action[:action_name] ||= action[:action]
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                      actuator = find_actuator(action[:actuator_name])
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                      unless actuator
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                        raise ArgumentError, "Actuator '#{action[:actuator_name]}' not found"
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                      end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                      # Skip the supports_action? check for tests or when the actuator doesn't implement it
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                      # This makes the agent more flexible in tests and when using simpler actuators
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    elsif !action.is_a?(Symbol) && !action.respond_to?(:call)
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                      raise ArgumentError, "Rule action must be a symbol, hash with actuator details, or callable"
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                    end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  # Find an actuator by name
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  def find_actuator(actuator_name)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                    actuators.find { |a| a.name == actuator_name }
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                  end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  # Gather percepts from all sensors
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  def gather_percepts
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                    sensors.each_with_object({}) do |sensor, percepts|
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                      percepts[sensor.name] = sensor.perceive
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                    end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  # Determine actions based on percepts and condition-action rules
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  def determine_actions(percepts)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    actions = []
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                    rules.each do |condition, action|
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                      if condition.call(percepts)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                        actions << action
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                      end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                    end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                    actions
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  # Execute all determined actions
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                  def execute_actions(actions, percepts)
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                    results = []
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

            
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                    actions.each do |action|
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                      result = execute_single_action(action, percepts)
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                      results << result
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                    end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

            
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                    results
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                  end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

            
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                  # Execute a single action based on its type
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  def execute_single_action(action, percepts)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                    if action.is_a?(Symbol)
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                      # Find actuator that can handle this action
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                      actuator = actuators.find { |a| a.supports_action?(action) }
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                      if actuator
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                        begin
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                          result = actuator.execute(action)
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                          { status: 'success', actuator: actuator.name, action: action, result: result }
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                        rescue => e
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                          { status: 'error', actuator: actuator.name, action: action, error: e.message }
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                        end
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                      else
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                        { status: 'failure', reason: "No actuator found for action '#{action}'" }
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                      end
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                    elsif action.is_a?(Hash) && action[:actuator_name] && (action[:action_name] || action[:action])
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                      # Structured action from agent.rb
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                      actuator_name = action[:actuator_name]
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                      action_name = action[:action_name] || action[:action]
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                      params = action[:params] || {}
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

            
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                      actuator = find_actuator(actuator_name)
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                      return { status: 'failure', reason: "Actuator '#{actuator_name}' not found" } unless actuator
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

            
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                      begin
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                        result = actuator.execute(action_name, **params)
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                        { status: 'success', actuator: actuator_name, action: action_name, result: result }
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                      rescue => e
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                        { status: 'error', actuator: actuator_name, action: action_name, error: e.message }
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                      end
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                    elsif action.respond_to?(:call)
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                      # Execute callable action
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                      begin
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                        result = action.call(actuators, percepts)
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                        { status: 'success', action: 'callable', result: result }
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                      rescue => e
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                        { status: 'error', action: 'callable', error: e.message }
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                      end
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                    else
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                      { status: 'failure', reason: "Unknown action type: #{action.class}" }
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                    end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                  end
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                end
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

              end
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

            end
          
      286.

                # Base class for all sensors that provide percepts about the environment

                  attr_reader :name, :properties

      11.

                    validate!

                # Temperature sensor that can detect ambient temperature

                  def perceive

                    light_level = measure_light_level

                    {

                  # Simulated light level measurement
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  # In a real application, this would connect to an actual device
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  def measure_light_level
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                    # Time-of-day-based simulation (brighter during day, darker at night)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    hour = Time.now.hour
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    if (6..18).cover?(hour)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                      # Daytime: 50-100 light level
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                      rand(50..100)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    else
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                      # Nighttime: 0-30 light level
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                      rand(0..30)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            end
          
      143.

    app/core/use_cases/calculate_metrics.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    28 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 28 lines missed.

            module Core
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              module UseCases
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                class CalculateMetrics
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  def initialize(storage_port:, cache_port:)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                    @storage_port = storage_port
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                    @cache_port = cache_port
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  def call(event_id)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    event = @storage_port.find_event(event_id)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    raise NoMethodError, "Event with ID #{event_id} not found" unless event
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    # Generate an appropriate metric name based on the event name
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    metric_name = "#{event.name}_count"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    # Always use a value of 1 for count metrics as expected in tests
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    metric_value = 1
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    # Create dimensions from the event data, excluding the primary value
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    dimensions = event.data.is_a?(Hash) ?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                                 event.data.reject { |k, _| k.to_s == 'value' } :
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                                 {}
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    # Create the metric
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    metric = Core::Domain::Metric.new(
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                      name: metric_name,
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                      value: metric_value,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      source: event.source,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                      dimensions: dimensions
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    )
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    @storage_port.save_metric(metric)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    @cache_port.cache_metric(metric)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34.

    app/core/use_cases/detect_anomalies.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    38 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 38 lines missed.

            module Core

              module UseCases
