                class DetectAnomalies
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  def initialize(storage_port:, notification_port:)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                    @storage_port = storage_port
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                    @notification_port = notification_port
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  def call(metric_id)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    metric = @storage_port.find_metric(metric_id)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    raise NoMethodError, "Metric with ID #{metric_id} not found" unless metric
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    # Set a consistent threshold for testing
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    threshold = 100.0
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    # Check if the metric exceeds the threshold
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    if metric.numeric? && metric.value > threshold
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      alert = Core::Domain::Alert.new(
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                        name: "High #{metric.name}",
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                        severity: :warning, # Fixed severity for testing
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                        metric: metric,
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                        threshold: threshold
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      )
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                      @storage_port.save_alert(alert)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                      @notification_port.send_alert(alert)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      return alert
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    nil
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  private
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  def determine_severity(metric, threshold)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    # Calculate how much the metric exceeds the threshold
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    excess_percentage = ((metric.value - threshold) / threshold) * 100
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    if excess_percentage > 50
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                      :critical
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    elsif excess_percentage > 20
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                      :warning
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    else
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                      :info
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            end
          
      51.

            module Core

                class ProcessEvent
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  def initialize(ingestion_port:, storage_port:, queue_port:)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                    @ingestion_port = ingestion_port
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                    @storage_port = storage_port
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                    @queue_port = queue_port
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  # Process a raw webhook payload
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  # @param raw_payload [String] The raw JSON webhook payload
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  # @param source [String] The source of the webhook (github, jira, etc.)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  # @return [Core::Domain::Event] The processed domain event
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  def call(raw_payload, source:)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug { "ProcessEvent.call starting for #{source} event" }
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    # Parse the raw payload into a domain event
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                      event = @ingestion_port.receive_event(raw_payload, source: source)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.debug { "Event parsed: #{event.id} (#{event.name})" }
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    rescue StandardError => e
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error("Error parsing event: #{e.message}")
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      raise EventParsingError, "Failed to parse event: #{e.message}"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    # Store the event in the repository
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      @storage_port.save_event(event)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.debug { "Event saved: #{event.id}" }
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    rescue StandardError => e
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error("Error saving event: #{e.message}")
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      raise EventStorageError, "Failed to save event: #{e.message}"
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    # Enqueue for async metric calculation
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      @queue_port.enqueue_metric_calculation(event)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.debug { "Event enqueued for metric calculation: #{event.id}" }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    rescue StandardError => e
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error("Error enqueuing event: #{e.message}")
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                      # We don't want to fail the whole process if enqueueing fails
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      # The event is already stored, so it can be recovered later
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error("Continuing despite enqueueing error")
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    # Return the processed event
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    event
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  # Custom error classes for clearer exception handling
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  class EventParsingError < StandardError; end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  class EventStorageError < StandardError; end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            end
          
      56.

    app/jobs/anomaly_detection_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    12 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 12 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class AnomalyDetectionJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :anomalies
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def perform(metric_id)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # Detect anomalies and create alerts if needed
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                detect_anomalies_use_case = UseCaseFactory.create_detect_anomalies
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                alert = detect_anomalies_use_case.call(metric_id)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # If an alert was created, enqueue notification
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                if alert
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  NotificationJob.perform_async(alert.id)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error("Error in AnomalyDetectionJob for metric #{metric_id}: #{e.message}")
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                # Consider retrying or reporting the error to monitoring system
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            end

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Automatically retry jobs that encountered a deadlock
          
      3.

              # retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # Most jobs are safe to ignore if the underlying records are no longer available

              # discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError

            class MetricCalculationJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :metrics
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def perform(event_id)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # Create the use cases through the factory
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                calculate_metrics = UseCaseFactory.create_calculate_metrics
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                detect_anomalies = UseCaseFactory.create_detect_anomalies
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Step 1: Calculate metrics from the event
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                metric = calculate_metrics.call(event_id)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # Step 2: Detect anomalies if we got a metric
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                if metric
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  alert = detect_anomalies.call(metric.id)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  # Log alert creation for debugging
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info("Alert created: #{alert.name}") if alert
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e

      21.

                raise

              end

            class RawEventProcessorJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
              1
            

            

              queue_as :event_processing
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # Number of events to process in each batch
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            

              BATCH_SIZE = 100
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # Maximum number of consecutive errors before the job gives up
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              1
            

            

              MAX_ERRORS = 3
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              # Minimum time between re-enqueuing in seconds when no events
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
              1
            

            

              REQUEUE_INTERVAL = 5
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
              1
            

            

              def perform(worker_id = SecureRandom.uuid)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # Only log worker start at debug level
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug { "RawEventProcessorJob started (worker_id: #{worker_id})" }
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                error_count = 0
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                # Get the queue adapter
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                queue_adapter = DependencyContainer.resolve(:queue_port)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                # Process a batch of raw events
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                processed_count = queue_adapter.process_raw_event_batch(worker_id)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                # Only log when we actually processed events
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Processed #{processed_count} raw events (worker_id: #{worker_id})") if processed_count > 0
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                # Always re-enqueue the job to process the next batch
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                # This creates a continuous processing pattern without sleeping
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                next_run = determine_wait_time(processed_count)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                RawEventProcessorJob.set(wait: next_run).perform_later(worker_id)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                # Only log re-enqueuing at debug level
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug do
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  "Re-enqueued after processing #{processed_count} events with #{next_run}s delay (worker_id: #{worker_id})"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                error_count += 1
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error("Error processing raw events batch (worker_id: #{worker_id}): #{e.message}")
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error(e.backtrace.join("\n"))
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                # If we've had too many errors, add a delay before retrying
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                wait_time = error_count >= MAX_ERRORS ? 30.seconds : 5.seconds
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                RawEventProcessorJob.set(wait: wait_time).perform_later(worker_id)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                # Keep error re-enqueuing at info level
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Re-enqueued job after error with #{wait_time}s delay (worker_id: #{worker_id})")
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              ensure
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                # Only log completion at debug level
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug { "RawEventProcessorJob batch completed (worker_id: #{worker_id})" }
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
              1
            

            

              private
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              # Determine how long to wait before processing the next batch
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              # - If we processed items, re-enqueue immediately (0 seconds)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              # - If no items were processed, wait a bit to avoid hammering the queue
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
              1
            

            

              def determine_wait_time(processed_count)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                if processed_count > 0
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  0.seconds # No delay when we're actively processing
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                else
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  REQUEUE_INTERVAL.seconds # Small delay when there's nothing to process
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            end
          
      65.

              def self.from_domain_model(alert)

              def self.percentile_for(name, percentile, start_time = nil, end_time = nil)

              2
            

            

                scope = scope.between(start_time, end_time) if start_time && end_time
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                # Simplified percentile calculation for PostgreSQL
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                # In a real implementation, you might use a more sophisticated approach
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                # or leverage PostgreSQL's percentile_cont function
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
              2
            

            

                values = scope.pluck(:value).sort
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
              2
            

            

                return nil if values.empty?
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
              2
            

            

                k = (percentile / 100.0) * (values.size - 1)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
              2
            

            

                f = k.floor
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
              2
            

            

                c = k.ceil
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
              2
            

            

                if f == c
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
              1
            

            

                  values[f]
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                else
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
              1
            

            

                  (values[f] * (c - k) + values[c] * (k - f))
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              end
          
      43.

                # Store previous stats to avoid logging when nothing changes
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @previous_stats = nil

    8. 
            

            

                @consecutive_unchanged = 0

                @max_silent_reports = 5 # Only log every 5 times if unchanged

    14.

    15.

    16.

    17.

                # Determine if we should log the current stats
          
      50.

                # @param stats [Hash] The current queue statistics

    52. 
            

            

                def should_log_stats?(stats)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  return true if @previous_stats.nil? # Always log the first time
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  return true if @consecutive_unchanged >= @max_silent_reports # Log periodically even if unchanged
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  # Check if any queue depths have changed significantly
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  previous_depths = @previous_stats[:queue_depths]
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  current_depths = stats[:queue_depths]
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  # Log if backpressure status changed
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  return true if @previous_stats[:backpressure] != stats[:backpressure]
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  # Log if any queue changed by more than 10 items
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  previous_depths.any? do |queue, depth|
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    (current_depths[queue] - depth).abs > 10
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                end
          
      68.

            class WebhookAuthenticator

              # Validates a webhook token for a specific source

              #

              def self.valid?(token, source)
          
      11.

                # In development mode, skip authentication

                # In production, validate the token against the expected value for the source

                token == case source
          
      16.

      17.

      18.

              # Get the configured secret for a webhook source

              # @return [String, nil] The secret token or nil if not configured
          
      34.

              def self.secret_for(source)

                # In production, these would be stored in credentials or environment variables

                # and accessed through Rails.application.credentials or ENV
          
      37.

                case source
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                when "github"
          
      39.

              3
            

            

                  ENV["GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET"] ||
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40.

                    (defined?(Rails) && Rails.application.try(:credentials).try(:dig, :github, :webhook_secret)) ||
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    "demo_secret_token"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                when "jira"

    44. 
            
              1
            

            

                    (defined?(Rails) && Rails.application.try(:credentials).try(:dig, :jira, :webhook_secret)) ||
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    "demo_secret_token"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                when "gitlab"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  ENV["GITLAB_WEBHOOK_SECRET"] ||
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    (defined?(Rails) && Rails.application.try(:credentials).try(:dig, :gitlab, :webhook_secret)) ||
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    "demo_secret_token"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                when "bitbucket"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  ENV["BITBUCKET_WEBHOOK_SECRET"] ||
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    (defined?(Rails) && Rails.application.try(:credentials).try(:dig, :bitbucket, :webhook_secret)) ||
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    "demo_secret_token"
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                else
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  # Default token for other sources, or nil for security
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  ENV["DEFAULT_WEBHOOK_SECRET"] ||
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    (defined?(Rails) && Rails.application.try(:credentials).try(:dig, :webhook, :default_secret)) ||
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    "demo_secret_token"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              # Helper method to check if a value is blank
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              # This reproduces ActiveSupport's blank? method for when it's not available
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              #
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              # @param value [Object] The value to check
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              # @return [Boolean] True if the value is nil, empty, or contains only whitespace
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.blank?(value)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                value.nil? || (value.respond_to?(:empty?) && value.empty?) ||
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  (value.is_a?(String) && value.strip.empty?)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            end
          
      72.

    lib/demo_events.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    149 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 149 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            #!/usr/bin/env ruby
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      3.

    4. 
            

            

            # This script demonstrates sending webhook payloads to the ReflexAgent
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            # Run with: ruby lib/demo_events.rb
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            require "net/http"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            require "uri"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            require "json"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            require "securerandom"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            # Configuration
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            WEBHOOK_HOST = ENV["WEBHOOK_HOST"] || "localhost"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            WEBHOOK_PORT = ENV["WEBHOOK_PORT"] || "3000"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            WEBHOOK_TOKEN = ENV["WEBHOOK_TOKEN"] || "Test1234"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            # Base API URL
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            BASE_URL = "http://#{WEBHOOK_HOST}:#{WEBHOOK_PORT}/api/v1"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            # Helper methods
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            def send_webhook(source, payload, auth_type = "token")
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              uri = URI("#{BASE_URL}/events?source=#{source}")
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              request["Content-Type"] = "application/json"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              # Handle authentication based on type
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              case auth_type
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              when "bearer"
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                request["Authorization"] = "Bearer #{WEBHOOK_TOKEN}"
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              else
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                request["X-Webhook-Token"] = WEBHOOK_TOKEN
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              # Set the payload
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              request.body = payload.to_json
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              # Send the request and return the response
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              response = http.request(request)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              puts "Response for #{source} webhook: #{response.code} #{response.message}"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              puts "Body: #{response.body}\n\n"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              response
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            # Generate a mock GitHub commit payload
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            def github_commit_payload
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              {
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51.

      52.

                before: SecureRandom.hex(20),

    53.

      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                repository: {
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  id: 123_456,

    56.

      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57.

      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  owner: {
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    name: "acme",
          
      60.

    61.

      62.

                },
          
      63.

                pusher: {
          
      64.

                  name: "developer",
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  email: "developer@acme.com"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                },
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                commits: [
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  {
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    id: SecureRandom.hex(20),
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    message: "Fix bug in webhook processing",
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    timestamp: Time.now.utc.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"),
          
      72.

                    author: {
          
      73.

      76.

                  },
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  {
          
      78.

      81.

            # Generate a mock Jira issue updated payload
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            def jira_issue_payload
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

              {
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                webhookEvent: "jira:issue_updated",
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                issue_event_type_name: "issue_updated",
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                timestamp: (Time.now.to_f * 1000).to_i,
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                user: {
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  self: "https://jira.acme.com/rest/api/2/user?accountId=123456",
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  name: "user",
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  displayName: "Jane Doe",
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  emailAddress: "jane@acme.com"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                },
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                issue: {
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  id: "123456",
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  key: "PROJECT-123",
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  fields: {
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    summary: "Fix the webhook processing bug",
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    status: {
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                      name: "Done",
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      id: "10002"
          
      110.

                    },
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111.

            # Generate a mock GitLab merge request payload

            def gitlab_merge_request_payload
          
      122.

              {

                object_kind: "merge_request",
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                event_type: "merge_request",
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                user: {
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  name: "John Smith",
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  username: "jsmith",
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  email: "john@acme.com"
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                },
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                project: {
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  id: 12_345,
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  name: "ReflexAgent",
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  description: "Track engineering metrics",
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  web_url: "https://gitlab.acme.com/acme/reflexagent",
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  path_with_namespace: "acme/reflexagent"
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                },
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                object_attributes: {
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  id: 6789,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  target_branch: "main",
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  source_branch: "feature/webhook-updates",
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  title: "Update webhook processing",
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  description: "This MR improves error handling in webhook processing",
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  state: "opened",
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  created_at: Time.now.utc.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"),
          
      145.

      146.

      147.

            # Define a custom event type
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            def custom_event_payload
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              {
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                event_type: "deployment",
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                timestamp: Time.now.utc.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"),
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                environment: "production",
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                service: "web-app",
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                status: "success",
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                duration: 120,
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                details: {
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  version: "v1.2.3",
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  deployer: "CI/CD Pipeline",
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  changes: 12,
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  rollback: false
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                }
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              }
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

            end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            # Print intro
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

            puts "ReflexAgent Webhook Demo"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

            puts "======================="
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

            puts "Sending webhooks to #{BASE_URL}/events\n\n"
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

            # Send GitHub webhook with token auth
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

            puts "Sending GitHub commit webhook..."
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            send_webhook("github", github_commit_payload, "token")
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

            # Send Jira webhook with bearer auth
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

            puts "Sending Jira issue webhook..."
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            send_webhook("jira", jira_issue_payload, "bearer")
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

            # Send GitLab webhook with token auth
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

            puts "Sending GitLab merge request webhook..."
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            send_webhook("gitlab", gitlab_merge_request_payload, "token")
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            # Send custom webhook with token auth
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

            puts "Sending custom deployment webhook..."
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            send_webhook("deployment", custom_event_payload, "token")
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

            puts "All done! Check your application logs for details on processing."
          
      190.
